channel.title: Help with wildy plz
channel.description: how can i make ppl stop teleporting in wildy with ::home and those? when tere almost dead they teleport... help plz[br][size=1]Posted on: October 20, 2007, 03:17:37 AM[/size][hr]aw come on help meh

item.title: Help with wildy plz
item.dc:creator: @tj007razor tj007razor
item.description:
@tj007razor wrote:

First, declare [code]public boolean inwildy = false;[/code] ----->then put in this method (yes it's a void which is a method without a return value) <-----[code]public void checkwildy() { if ((absY <= 10112 && absY >= 3970) || (absY <= 3672)) { inwildy = false; } else { inwildy = true; } }[/code]

Read full topic

item.title: Help with wildy plz
item.dc:creator: @X-J-K-X X-J-K-X
item.description:
@X-J-K-X wrote:

[quote=“tj007razor, post:16, topic:153691”]I KNOW WHAT THE VOID DOES, but if you put if (!inwildy) in the commands, it will make i so unless you are not in the wildy, you cannot use the command FOR INSTANCE if (command.startsWith("home")) { if (!inwildy) { animation(435, absY, absX); teleportToX = 3253; teleportToY = 3422; heightLevel = 0; duelStatus = -1; }else{ sendMessage("You are in the wilderness and cannot teleport out."); } } IT WORKS.[/quote]

Firstly, its not a void.

Secondly, instead of spamming up his topic with useless posts. Couldn’t you have just said? … LEL

item.title: Help with wildy plz
item.dc:creator: @X-J-K-X X-J-K-X
item.description:
@X-J-K-X wrote:

tj007razor:

It checks if they are in the wild, and if they are, they can’t tele out. How doesnt that not work? and sorry when i said if(!inwildy2) I meant if(!inwildy)

THAT ISNT A METHOD!..

public void checkwildy() { if ((absY <= 10112 && absY >= 3970) || (absY <= 3672)) { inwildy = false; } else { inwildy = true; } }

That CHECKS IF THEIR IN THE WILDERNESS OR NOT!..

if (!inwildy)…

That says their not in the wilderness, so they cannot be attacked. Bam

item.title: Help with wildy plz
item.dc:creator: @X-J-K-X X-J-K-X
item.description:
@X-J-K-X wrote:

[quote=“tj007razor, post:10, topic:153691”][quote][quote author=tj007razor link=topic=209079.msg1840278#msg1840278 date=1193120204]
If you want to make it so they cant command out of the wilderness, if eac tele command just add if(!inwildy2)
[/quote]

Urrr, no. Thats not on all sources. KTHX.

You could make a method. That tells the server, if the person is in wildy. They cannot teleport. If they are not in wildy. They can. Just a matter of knowledge. Use a boolean.
[/quote]

“KTHX” OK thanks for yellin at me for trying to help, gl making friends. Anyway, if he doesn’t have it, he could say so any maybe I’d give it to him?

Heres my checkwildy, if you need to you can change the coords.
First, declare public boolean inwildy = false; then put in this method (yes it’s a void which is a method without a return value) public void checkwildy() { if ((absY <= 10112 && absY >= 3970) || (absY <= 3672)) { inwildy = false; } else { inwildy = true; } } That’s a very basic wild check, you can add and change coords to fit your server better and then before commands put an if statement like if(!inwildy2)[/quote]

Rofl you think i come to moparisthebest.com, to make friends? Please do the honours of getting a life. I come here to help. Not to make friends im gonna speak to once, and then never speak to again
KTHX!

Read full topic

item.title: Help with wildy plz
item.dc:creator: @tj007razor tj007razor
item.description:
@tj007razor wrote:

[quote author=tj007razor link=topic=209079.msg1840278#msg1840278 date=1193120204] If you want to make it so they cant command out of the wilderness, if eac tele command just add [code]if(!inwildy2)[/code] [/quote]

Urrr, no. Thats not on all sources. KTHX.

You could make a method. That tells the server, if the person is in wildy. They cannot teleport. If they are not in wildy. They can. Just a matter of knowledge. Use a boolean.

Sorry uncalled for. Anyway, if he doesn’t have it, he could say so any maybe I’d give it to him?

Heres my checkwildy, if you need to you can change the coords.
First, declare public boolean inwildy = false; then put in this method (yes it’s a void which is a method without a return value) public void checkwildy() { if ((absY <= 10112 && absY >= 3970) || (absY <= 3672)) { inwildy = false; } else { inwildy = true; } } That’s a very basic wild check, you can add and change coords to fit your server better and then before commands put an if statement like if(!inwildy2)

Read full topic
